scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint Jerome by his halo and scholarly activity, is seated and reading from an open book. He wears a reddish-brown tunic and a purple mantle. To his right, an angel, identifiable by its wings and halo, presents another open book to Saint Jerome, pointing to its pages. The scene takes place indoors, with a dark, textured wall behind the figures and a blue, star-studded background to the left, suggesting a celestial or scholarly setting. The floor is tiled. The overall composition evokes the moment of divine inspiration or instruction.
